name: powerapps-get-app-users-list-csv
title: Export all PowerApps details and its Role assignments from Tenant in CSV format
shortDescription: This script sample how to export all the PowerApps details and its role assignment in csv format
longDescription: This powershell script will export all the powerapps of all its environment in a particular tenant and its role assignments(user access details) in csv format.

references.name: Want to learn more about Power Apps PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the Power Apps PowerShell documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
